app.name: Task Manager Pro
app.tagline: Advanced task management and collaboration tool
app.description: A comprehensive task management application that helps teams organize, prioritize, and track their work efficiently. Features include kanban boards, sprint planning, time tracking, and real-time collaboration.
app.longDescription:
Task Manager Pro is a powerful project management tool designed for modern teams. It combines the simplicity of todo lists with advanced features like sprint planning, time tracking, and analytics. Whether you're managing a small team or coordinating across departments, Task Manager Pro helps you stay organized and productive.

Key Features:
- Kanban boards with drag-and-drop
- Sprint planning and backlog management
- Time tracking and estimates
- Team collaboration and assignments
- Custom workflows and automations
- Real-time updates and notifications
- Advanced filtering and search
- Detailed analytics and reports
